episodes.title: On Point: U.S. Seeks Extradition of Pastor Apollo Quiboloy
episodes.description:
August 21, 2025 Episode

Pinky Webb gets #OnPoint, where she asks the tough questions, tackles key issues, and clears the facts.

The United States is reportedly seeking the extradition of detained Pastor Apollo Quiboloy, who faces multiple criminal charges in the Philippines. Philippine Ambassador to the U.S., Jose Manuel Romualdez, confirms the request was made last June.

Quiboloy’s legal team emphasizes that Philippine courts should resolve his domestic cases first. 

Join us as we go on point with his legal counsel, Attorney Ferdinand Topacio, for the latest updates.
